91.explanation_en:
Regional flights are vital lifelines for economic growth, tourism, and accessibility. As a municipality, our role is to ensure smart investments that benefit our residents. Supporting regional air connectivity can:

 Boost Local Business & Tourism ‚Äì Improved air links attract investors and visitors, driving local economic growth.
 Ensure Essential Connectivity ‚Äì Many rely on regional flights for work, healthcare, and family connections

244.explanation_en:
**Candidate's Reply:**  

*"Investing in Our Future: Public Healthcare for Schools"*  

The health and well-being of our children should be a top priority. Instead of outsourcing statutory school health examinations to private clinics, Helsinki should **strengthen its public healthcare workforce**. Here‚Äôs why:  

üë©‚Äç‚öïÔ∏è **Better Continuity of Care** ‚Äì School nurses and doctors employed by the city build long-term relationships with students and families, ensuring consistent and personalized care.  

üí∞ **More Cost-Effective in the Long Run** ‚Äì While private contracts may seem efficient, investing in public healthcare professionals keeps expertise within the system and reduces reliance on expensive external services.  

Stronger Integration with Schools  

Rather than short-term outsourcing, **let‚Äôs strengthen our public health system**‚Äîhiring and supporting professionals who are committed to the well-being of Helsinki‚Äôs students.

election_promise_3.en:
Helsinki is a city of opportunities, but for too many immigrant families, those opportunities remain just out of reach. Better integration is not just an ideal‚Äîit is a necessity. As a candidate in the upcoming municipal elections, I am committed to ensuring that every immigrant, especially mothers and families, feels truly at home in Finland.

I will advocate for stronger support systems, better access to education, and meaningful employment opportunities that reflect the talents and skills of our diverse communities. Integration is not just about learning the language‚Äîit is about feeling seen, heard, and valued.

As a voice for immigrant mothers, I understand the challenges they face‚Äîthe struggle to navigate a new culture, to ensure their children receive the best education, and to build a life where they feel included and empowered. That is why I will push for family-friendly policies, improved language learning programs, and better representation of immigrant voices in decision-making.

A truly inclusive Helsinki means that no mother feels alone, no child is left behind, and no talent goes unnoticed. Together, we can build a city where every family, regardless of their background, has the opportunity to thrive, contribute, and belong.

Moderni mutta juurtunut perinteeseen
lifevalues.en:
Motherhood & Family First ‚Äì Being a devoted mother, daughter, and sister is at the heart of my life,Healing & Wellness ‚Äì True well-being comes from balance‚Äîphysical, emotional, and cultural. I believe in holistic care, supporting children, families, and communities in their journey toward healing and strength.

Cultural Connection & Community Building ‚Äì I strive to create spaces where cultures meet, traditions are honored, and new communities grow. By bridging gaps, we build a stronger, more inclusive society. Empowering Immigrant Mothers -I understand their challenges and aspirations. I am committed to advocating for their needs, ensuring they are seen, heard, and supported.  Modern Yet Rooted in Tradition

election_promise_2.en:
intelligent but also compassionate, balanced, and sustainable. My second election promise is to strengthen education for children, support for families, and environmental protection, all within a vision of a truly sustainable society‚Äîone that prioritizes both people and the planet equally.

Having dedicated my life to the delicate balance between health, environment, and community, I now bring the same harmony to politics. My vision for Helsinki is one where holistic well-being and progressive policies work together to create a greener, healthier, and more inclusive city for all.

While the world is captivated by artificial intelligence, smartphones, and the rapid pace of innovation, we must also nurture a more tender, human-centered approach. Inspired by Ayurvedic principles, I believe in a future where progress is measured not only by technology but by the well-being of our children, the resilience of our communities, and the health of our environment.

By integrating sustainability, education, and family support, I will work to build a Helsinki that flourishes‚Äîwhere every child has access to quality education, every family feels supported, and every citizen can breathe clean air, drink pure water, and thrive in a city that respects and protects nature.

This is my promise: a future where innovation and tradition, progress and tenderness, growth and harmony come together for the well-being of all.

municipality_fix.en: Our municipality needs more parks and green spaces designed specifically for children aged 10 to 15. Right now, most parks cater to either very young kids or older teens, leaving this age group with limited outdoor options. We should create well-designed, accessible green areas that encourage them to connect with nature, be active, and enjoy outdoor spaces. This investment will promote healthier lifestyles and stronger community engagement for our youth

election_promise_1.en:
I stand before you not just as a candidate, but as someone deeply committed to transforming our healthcare system into one that truly nurtures both the body and mind. As a holistic healer, I believe in a healthcare approach that prioritizes mental well-being, strengthens our healthcare centers, and ensures that every child grows up in a supportive, healthy environment.

Our children‚Äôs health and future are at stake. With the rise of excessive screen time, we must advocate for mindful technology use and promote mental resilience through holistic care. I will work to expand mental health services, integrate alternative healing methods, and create wellness programs that empower individuals to lead balanced, fulfilling lives.

My vision is clear: a healthcare system that provides more choices, greater accessibility, and a stronger focus on prevention and well-being. Together, we can build a future where every person‚Äîyoung and old‚Äîreceives the care, support, and opportunities they deserve.
